mapper.select: SELECT id, getAvgKSeriesDataByClassId(#{templateid}, id) KSeriesData FROM `clazz` WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM `clazz` WHERE POSITION(id IN (SELECT `name1` FROM `template` WHERE id = #{templateid})) != 0)

SELECT c.`id`, c.`name`, MAX(l.`total`) maxScore, MIN(l.`total`) minScore, ROUND(AVG(l.`total`), 1) avgScore, getNearestTemplateStart(c.`id`) nearestTemplateStart FROM `learning` l INNER JOIN `stu_clazz` sc ON sc.`sid` = l.`uid` INNER JOIN `clazz` c ON c.`id` = sc.`cid` AND POSITION(c.`id` IN (SELECT `name1` FROM `template` WHERE `template`.`id` = #{templateId})) != 0 WHERE l.`templateid` = #{templateId} GROUP BY c.`id`
